inclusion.criterion: Cesarean Section performed by Pfannenstiel skin incision
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindication to post operative NSAID's or Narcotics
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, with a history of frequent alcohol consumption. She is being treated for acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis.
